item.title: Run Multiple Instances of Same Springboot Application in Intellij
item.description: Suppose i want to run two instances of my application. For this : Run(top bar)-> Edit Configuration Using left top corner + sign add configuration by choosing Application. Now you’ll have your existing application configuration and one “unnamed” configuration. Fill the “unnamed” configuration fields by copying from your application configuration of which you want to run another instance. Only two fields will differ - Name, VM options. In VM options in both the existing configuration and new configuration fill the field as -Dserver.
